name: Protected Invasion
description:
Its an alien invasion and only few people survived. You are the only one who has the ability to protect everyone and it is also your duty. In this game your reflexes will be tested because you have to kill all the aliens coming to you while preventing the left survivors from getting themselves hurt. The left survivors will always find an opportunity to escape your protection and you could say they are OUT OF your CONTROL because all they want is to go with the aliens and take the "easy way" out of the invasion.

Your tasks : Don't let the aliens kill you and don't let the suicidal survivors escape.

If you fail by getting killed or letting a survivor get killed, then you will hear an earrape sound coming from your guilt.

Protected Invasion, play now (or not, cuz its terrible...).

This game was made for the 2020 GMTK game jam and was made in only 1 day.

BUT do play my other game RAGDOLLS N EXPLOSIONS.

Have a spare dollar or two? We'll keep it. This game ain't worth donation.
